Question: Guangzhou Havit Technology Company Limited CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
HAVIT Technology co., Ltd

Product: H655BT PRO

- Features eco-friendly and low-carbon packaging strategy
- Optimizes packaging structure and volume following UN Environment Programme's Redesign-Reduce-Recycle principles
- Employs 100% recyclable FSC-certified product packaging materials
- Reduces plastic usage by at least 80%
- Utilizes pure vegetable-based ink for printing
- Replaces UV-coating with satin aqueous coating and embossing and debossing processes
- PLA plastic used can be degraded within one year
- Supports sustainable growth with practical steps
- Showcased at CES 2024 alongside other innovative products
Summary_cn:
哈威特科技有限公司

产品：H655BT PRO

- 采用环保低碳包装策略
- 根据联合国环境计划的重新设计-减少-循环利用原则，优化包装结构和体积
- 使用100%可回收的FSC认证产品包装材料
- 至少减少80%的塑料使用量
- 使用纯植物基油墨进行印刷
- 将紫外线涂层替换为缎面水性涂层，并使用压印和凹印工艺
- 使用的PLA塑料可在一年内降解
- 通过实际措施支持可持续增长
- 与其他创新产品一同在2024年的CES展览中展示
